message.body: Hey there! How are you.
Hi! I'm fine, how are you?
I am great, I am going away with my wife to celebrate our 10 year anniversary.
Congratulations, that's wonderful!
Thanks. What are you up to?
Trying to get motivated lol. I need to go to a coffee shop to study but there's a wonderful cat here with me ;-)
Study for what? Finals?
Nope. Step 3 medical boards.
I think my mistake was checking Twitter to see what's going on in Turkey. Gotta close Twitter! Lol
Are you a resident now? What specialty
What's going on in turkey?
I'm not a resident now. Applied to a very limited # of programs + didn't get in so I'm reapplying
with board scores this time.
Turks are protesting- started because govt wants to build on a popular park.
But govt is reacting like a dictatorship which is a shame and only makes ppl more angry.
Are you from turkey?
No. I just follow news a lot.
Had a pretty positive impression of their govt actually.
Should I let you study?
I'm getting my things together now. Perhaps check back in a bit?
Ok l8r
Likewise- I don't want to bother you on your romantic trip so let me know when 2 stop txting
We don't leave for a few hours. Just cleaning the house now?
Now.
10 years is great. We just celebrated 4 but time flies!
It is not easy. You have to make your wants and needs known, but then put them aside and put your spouse first.
Actually most of the time it's been easier than I expected. But I'm very lucky.
I have a very very kind husband.
I went to electrical construction school for four years while working full time during our marriage. I know it is hard to work, study and be married.
That is great
That's the other reason I'm not in a residency now. I had to prove my marriage comes 1st. Now he knows!
What do you construct?
Traffic signals, street lighting, fiber optic systems, vehicle detection.
That's awesome! Something that's actually practical.
My wife is an RN. Not working now as we have four girls between nine and eight months.
I'd say she's working! That's really great. A houseful of love...
She sure does work and home schools too. Your husband does?
Yes, he's in the restaurant biz.
What part of the country are you in? We are in california.
PA. Hope you're not near the fires?
The house next door is on fire. We should probably evacuate.
At least give it some thought.
Just kidding. We are far from the fires.
Its on a to do list.
Just kidding too. Txt + Twitter are playgrounds for the sarcastically inclined.
There you go.
Indeed. What about sarcasm in medicine?
Bingo. But the powers that be take themselves quite seriously, so one must be judicious!
